thread.title: BRIEF-Sierra Metals Reports Q1 2018 Revenues Of $46.6 Mln At Sociedad Minera Corona Subsidiary

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sierra Metals Reports Q1 2018 Revenues Of $46.6 Mln At Sociedad Minera Corona Subsidiary

organizations.name: sociedad minera corona subsidiary  sierra metals inc

text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:15 AM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Sierra Metals Reports Q1 2018 Revenues Of $46.6 Mln At Sociedad Minera Corona Subsidiary Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Sierra Metals Inc:
* SIERRA METALS REPORTS STRONG Q1-2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AT ITS SOCIEDAD MINERA CORONA SUBSIDIARY IN PERU
* SIERRA METALS INC - SOCIEDAD MINERA CORONA S.A. HAD Q1 2018 REVENUES OF US$46.6 MILLION VERSUS. US$38.5 MILLION IN Q1 2017
* SIERRA METALS INC - SOCIEDAD MINERA CORONA S.A. HAD TOTAL TONNES PROCESSED OF 271,389 IN Q1 2018 VERSUS. 251,180 IN Q1 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
